profile:
Absolute Home Services is a one stop shop for all of your home services. We currently specialize in:
 
1. Interior and Exterior Painting
2. Handyman Services
3. Lawn and Garden Maintenance
4. Landscaping
5. Interlock

 
Please contact us through email, website or phone call. The PING messaging service does not work well for communication purposes.
 
Customer satisfaction and retention is our primary focus. Therefore, we will do whatever it takes to ensure you are happy with our quality and service. Our goal is to have a customer for life! We want you to use us for all of our services, so we ensure you are happy after each service you use.
 
We service:
 
Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Milton, Toronto, Vaughan, Aurora, Newmarket, Barrie and Muskoka
 
We work on both commercial and residential projects.
 
Whether we are landscaping or painting, we have experienced people in each of their trades. Our painters take pride in what they do and are passionate providing high quality paint jobs. We have experts in interlock, lawn care and garden services who will give you the advice you need and a professional job.
 
Our service is what sets us a part from the rest. We have great people to provide great quality work, but we also have a goal to retain our customers for multiple services. In order to achieve this goal, we need to provide clear expectations, detailed quotes, communicate and deliver what we promise.
service_area: We service the GTA including Hamilton, Burlington, Oakville, MIlton, Mississsauga, Etobicoke, Barrie, Newmarket, Aurora, Vaughan and Muskoka areas. We will also service Toronto for some of services. We don't service Toronto for lawn cutting and gardening unfortunately.
products:
We only use top of the line products for paint, soil and concrete products. We work with our suppliers to get the best rates and service so that we can pass it along to you. We will use any product you like, but we have great relationships with the following suppliers:
1. Dulux Paints
2. Sherwin Williams Paints
3. Benjamin Moore Paints
4. Muskoka Lumber
5. Connon's Nursaries
6. Burlington Garden Supplies
7. Cap-Brick
8. Hamilton Building Supplies
9. Petrie's Garden Supplies
10. Green Horizon's Sod Farms
services:
We provide services residential and commercial properties.

We offer the following services in each category:
1. Interior painting-Walls, trim, ceilings, kitchen cabinet spraying and                       staircase refinishing, drywall and drywall repair
2. Exterior painting-Soffits, windows, wood, vinyl and aluminum siding, doors, decks and fences
3. Lawn maintenance-lawn cutting,gardening, fertilizing, weed control, overseeding, aerating, spring and fall clean up and sodding
4. Landscaping-Interlock and planting
5. Handyman Services-stone veneer, backsplash, baseboards, laminate flooring, drywall and more.

We are also happy to clean your windows and steam clean your ceramic tiles and grout

Flood Stains
Benjamin Moore

specialities:
Interior AND Exterior painting
Lawn cutting

diplomas: Bachelor of Civil Engineering from the University of Western Ontario
project_rate: We need to come to your home to look at the project. In most cases we can provide a detailed written
warranty_terms: 2 years for painting, 3 years for interlock
